name: vault.rpg (Feenicks)
description:
A treasure-hunting game, in the vaguest of senses.

Made for the 2019 One Map Contest.

____________

Features:

- From the start, go almost anywhere!

- Pick up treasures of varying sorts, from stat boosts to new skills, and customize your two treasure hunters to take down increasingly dangerous shadows and machines.

- Leave at any time, and get a ranking based on how much treasure you found.

[Music stolen from Lagrange Point, Sorcerian, and Cave Story]
